questions.question: Saponification number is the number of milligrams of KOH required to saponify 1 g fat. Which of the following statement is true about saponification number?

answers.a: The shorter is the chain length of fatty acids the higher is the saponification number
answers.b: The shorter is the chain length of fatty acids, the lower will be the saponification number
answers.c: The higher the chain saturation of fatty acid, the lower will be saponification number
answers.d: The lower is the saturation of fatty acid, the higher will be saponification number

questions.question: The degree of unsaturation of lipid can be measured as ____________.?
Generally fats with unsaturated fatty acids are ____________ at room temperature (25'C)?

answers.c: Liquid in the presence of oxygen
answers.d: Liquid in the absence of oxygen

questions.question: Iodine number is defined as number of grams of iodine needed for the iodination of ________ gram/grams of oil or fat?
The smaller is the saponification value, the higher will be the molecular weight of oil or fat.?
